name: Survival Fire Starter, 4 Inch Ferro Rod, Flint Fire Starters for Hiking and Camping, Flint and Steel Survival Tool with Paracord and Emerge
short_description: Ignite Fires Effortlessly: The 4x0.4 inch ferro rod produces 5,500°F (3,000°C) sparks, ensuring easy fire-starting in any weather conditions. Perfect for bushcraft, hiking, hunting, fishing, EDC, emergencies, BBQ, and gas camp stoves.
Magnesium Fire Starter Kit: This fire starter kit includes a 4-inch ferro rod, a 6-in-1 multi-tool scraper, durable paracord, and an emergency whistle. Essential survival tools all in one kit.
Multi-Functional Scraper: The 6-in-1 scraper features a straight-edge striker, tinder scraper, map scale, ruler, hex wrench, and bottle opener, making it a versatile tool for all survival scenarios.
Waterproof and Durable: Built to withstand wet and harsh conditions, this fire starter kit ensures you’re ready for any weather, delivering consistent performance every time.

Compact and Lightweight: The fire starter kit is compact and lightweight, easily fitting into your pocket or backpack, making it an essential addition to your camping, hiking, or emergency gear. Trust this kit for high-quality, reliable outdoor tools.

name: Fire Starter, Traditional Magnesium Ferro Rod, 20,000+ Strikes, Beech Handle, Survival Igniter with Neck Waxed Fire Tinder Paracord (28inch) & 6-in-1 Multi-Tool Striker-2 Packs
short_description: 【FUNCTIONAL AND DURABLE】 sparks shower at 5,500 F (3,000 C) to ignite a fire in any weather (even wet), at any altitude. Perfect emergency fire starter for Bushcraft, Hiking, Hunting, Fishing, EDC, Emergency, BBQ, Gas Camp Stoves, etc.
【2-PACK LARGER SIZE FIRE STARTER】The size is 4.88" (L) x 0.32" (Dia), and the starter length is 3.15". It is made of 100% magnesium rod that can be used for more than 20,000+ STRIKES.
【PORTABLE AND PRACTICAL】Paracord included, gives you a good grip and never comes off. Waterproof red waxed fire tinder paracord, it helps you to draw fire to your other outdoor equipment.
【6-IN-1 MULTI-TOOL】It can serve as a bottle opener, hex wrench, tinder & wood scraper, map scale, ruler, sharp fire starter scraper.
【BEECH HANDLE】It burns more easily when used as wood chips in emergency situations. You can cut wood chips from the wood handle and use it as fuel for combustion.

name: 99.9 Pure Magnesium Rod
short_description: High-Purity Magnesium Metal: Made from premium magnesium, these rods produce a bright white flame when ignited, perfect for outdoor survival, experiments, and emergency tools.
Portable Design: Each rod measures 0.63x3.54 inches, making it easy to carry for camping, hiking, and adventure activities.
Multi-Purpose Use: Suitable for fire-starting, anti-corrosion, experiments, and more, providing versatile performance.
Vacuum-Sealed Packaging: The magnesium rods are vacuum-sealed to protect against moisture and oxidation, ensuring long-term effectiveness and flammability.
High Combustibility: Simply scrape off some shavings, and with a small spark, they ignite quickly, making them ideal for survival and emergency fire-starting.

name: Texas Bushcraft Fire Starter - 3/8" Thick Ferro Rod with Striker and Paracord Wrist Lanyard – Waterproof Flint Fire Steel Survival Lighter for Your Camping, Hiking and Backpacking Gear
short_description: SURVIVE AND THRIVE in an emergency with this weather-resistant ferro rod fire starter in your survival kit. Unlike matches that can become wet or blown-out in wind, our fire steel is impervious to the elements.

5000 F DEGREES SPARKS are hot enough to ignite a variety of tinder including plant fuzz, goldenrod fluff, and cattail seed or milkweed down. Stay warm and keep the wolves at-bay with this foolproof fire steel.

15,000+ STRIKES from the Texas Bushcraft Fire Starter make it an essential part of your camping accessories. The included striker tool attached on the lanyard ensures that you’re always prepared for the unexpected.

INCLUDED SURVIVAL TOOL features a bottle opener, hex wrench, micro ruler, map scale and sharp spine scraper. It is affixed to the ferro rod by the 48” braided paracord lanyard for quick easy retrieval and use.

COMPACT AND PORTABLE so it fits in your pocket, backpack or auto glove box, the Texas Bushcraft flint steel also boasts a sturdy and comfortable hardwood handle that delivers optimal grip and control during use.

name: Ferro Rod Fire Starter, 6 Inch X 3/8 Inch Fire Starter Survival Tool, Flint and Steel for Camping and Hiking, Flint Fire Starter, Magnesium Fire Starter
short_description: Ferro Rod Fire Starter Survival Tool: The Hkoper fire starter kit includes a 6" ferro rod, a versatile 6-in-1 scraper, a durable paracord, and an emergency whistle—everything you need for survival in one compact kit

Efficient Ignition System: The 6 × 3/8 inch ferro rod generates 5,500°F (3,000°C) sparks, ensuring reliable fire-starting in any weather. Ideal for bushcraft, hiking, hunting, fishing, emergencies, BBQs, gas camp stoves, and more

Versatile Multi-Tool Scraper: The 6-in-1 scraper features a straight-edge striker, tinder scraper, map scale, ruler, hex wrench, and bottle opener, offering multiple tools for diverse survival scenarios
Durable and Waterproof: Designed for wet and harsh conditions, the Hkoper fire starter ensures reliable performance in any weather, keeping you ready for every adventure

Ultra-Portable & Lightweight: The compact, lightweight Hkoper fire starter kit fits easily in your pocket or backpack, making it an essential for camping, hiking, or emergency gear. Trust Hkoper for reliable, high-quality outdoor tools

name: Magnesium Fire Starter Waterproof Fire Steel Pouch for Camping, Hiking, Hunting, Backpacking,Outdoor Survival fire Striker kit
short_description: Magnesium rod is easily scraped off with striker,and is ignited by sparks from the flint,start fires in any weather conditions.
FIRE STARTERS : Each box includes 4 Magnesium Fire Starters can be used thousands of times.
Waterproof Fire Steel：Solid magnesium fuel bar with flint and steel scraper for outdoor survival.
Easy to Save: The size (3" x 1.2" x 3/8") magnesium fire starter with attached ball chain) is small, easy to keep in your bag.
Multi-Function: The blade of permanent match striker can be used as bottle opener and ruler.
product_description: Magnesium Fire Starter Waterproof Fire Steel Pouch for Camping, Hiking, Hunting, Backpacking,Outdoor Survival fire Striker kit

name: Fostar Outdoors Emergency Fire Starter，Magnesium Mg Rod Integrate with Ferro Rod, Paracord and Multi –Function Scraper Striker, Great for Bushcraft, Camping, Hiking, Hunting
short_description: The fire starter includes one 16mm x 80mm High Purity 99.99% Magnesium Metal Rod and one 6mm x 80mm ferrocerium rod, integrated in a plastic handle. he fire steel rod is the perfect balance between softness & durability, consistently outperforming the leading fire starters. Will ignite a 5,500º F spark, light a fire instantly when you need.

Paracord: Easier than ever to find your MG fire starter in low light. New reflective material “lights up” with the slightest flashlight beam. The length of paracord is about 40 inches, that is long enough to carry the fire starter around your neck.

Multi-function Scraper/Striker: Built in bottle opener, hex wrench, ruler, map scale and striker, it's a very useful tool in survival. Made of hardened steel creates large showers of sparks and scrape the magnesium rod easily.
Easy Grip: Ergonomic handles on the fire starter allow use by even the most frozen of fingers! This fire starter’s orange pp handle is 70mm long easy to hold.

Using the rod is also a simple way to light a stove and a gasoline grill in a shed or backyard. The reliability of the super rod has made it the favorite of outdoor experts, hunters, fishing enthusiasts, and campers

name: Magnesium Fire Starter Kit – 6 Bags Magnesium + Ferro Rod + 20 Waterproof Wax Ropes in Tin Box – Emergency Survival Tool for Camping, Hiking, Bushcraft
short_description: 99% Pure Magnesium Shavings (6 Bags) – Includes 6 sealed pouches of high-purity magnesium shavings (each 3 1/6" x 2 1/2"), ideal for fast, clean fire-starting. Shredded and chipped for instant ignition even in wet conditions.

Durable Ferro Rod with 2000 or More Strikes – The 4 x 50 mm ferrocerium rod delivers over 2000 sparks at 5,500°F. Easily ignites magnesium or dry tinder in wind, rain, or snow. Black coating must be scraped off before first use.

Compact Waterproof Storage Tin – Reusable tin box keeps your fire-starting gear organized and dry. Sized to fit into backpacks, glove compartments, and emergency kits. Ideal for survivalists and campers alike.
Lightweight & Travel-Ready – Ultralight materials and small footprint make this fire kit easy to carry anywhere. Perfect for hiking, bushcraft, prepping, and car emergency packs.

Reliable and Fuel-Free Ignition – No need for lighter fluid or matches. Magnesium burns hot and reliably, producing smoke and flame to ignite fires in emergencies. A practical solution when modern fuel sources fail.

name: The Friendly Swede Magnesium Fire Starter Kit 3-Pack — Flint and Steel Fire Starter Survival Tool; Weatherproof Firestarter for Camping, Hiking & BBQs; Flint and Steel Magnesium Bar; 6-in-1 Striker
short_description: EASY FIRE STARTING: Our magnesium fire starter kit makes it easy to throw sparks and start a fire. The Mag Bar works in any weather condition - rain, snow, high-altitude, etc. The fire starters are suitable for campfires, survival, bushcraft and other outdoor activities.
FIRST-STAGE TINDER IS BUILT-IN: The mag bar is your tinder, whereas common fire lighters require separate material, and it's not always easy to find something that will readily light.

EXTREMELY HOT SPARKS: The flint rod will throw hot sparks, no matter how windy or rainy it is. The handy striker, which also can be used as a bottle opener, makes this fire steel perfect for experts and beginners.

LONG-LASTING, CONVENIENT & COMPACT: You can light more than fifteen thousand fires with this bundle of 3 firesteel blocks. Use the attached chain so you never have to lose your flint and steel fire starter kit.
WEATHERPROOF: This flint fire starter survival lighter kit is weatherproof to strong winds, rain, snow, and even high altitudes. Rest assured that this magnesium fire starter will never let you down!

name: Ferro Rod Fire Starter Kit with 5 Inch Flint and Steel, Two 12 Inch Wax-Impregnated Tinders, 50 Inch 7-Core Paracord for Camping, Hiking, Boy Scouts, and Emergency Preparedness
short_description: Ultimate Fire Starter for Adventurers: The Terdemor flint and steel fire starter kit is designed for those who love the outdoors. Perfect for camping, hiking, family activities, and emergency preparedness. A thoughtful gift for sons, daughters, grandkids, husbands, and boyfriends.

Reliable Sparks in Any Condition: Equipped with a high-quality 5" Ferro Rods that generates sparks up to 5,500°F, our FIRE STARTER SURVIVAL TOOL ensures a fast and reliable ignition in any condition. Perfect for both beginners and seasoned survivalists.

Durable, Easy-to-Use Fire Striker: The 4"high speed stainless steel (3CR13) ferro rod striker is built for performance and durability, providing consistent and powerful sparks with every strike. It’s easy to grip and use, even in wet conditions.

Comprehensive Survival Kit: The kit includes everything you need for fire-starting: a 50" 7-core paracord, two 12" Wax-Impregnated Tinder Wick, and an emergency whistle. Compact and lightweight, it’s ideal for keeping in your backpack, bug-out bag, or emergency kit.

Perfect for Boy Scouts & Family Fun: Whether you're preparing for an emergency or teaching your kids about fire-starting, this magnesium fire starter rod is perfect for family adventures, Boy Scouts, and survival training. Give the gift of preparedness and adventure!
